profile.name: Yasaswini Reddy Naga
profile.title: Business Analyst
profile.organization: Humana | 3+ Years Experience | Saint Louis, MO

bio.introduction: Strategic Business Analyst with 3+ years of experience driving decision-making and operational excellence across healthcare and tech sectors. Skilled in SQL, Tableau, Power BI, and requirements elicitation to deliver high-impact analytical solutions.
bio.background: Demonstrated ability to synthesize complex data into actionable insights, optimize business processes, and align technological solutions with organizational objectives. Expert in stakeholder engagement, requirements analysis, and translating business needs into scalable, value-driven solutions in fast-paced environments.
bio.researchFocus: Specialized in healthcare analytics and process optimization, delivering $1.2M annual cost savings through data-driven insights. Proven track record in reducing claims processing errors by 18%, improving workflow efficiency by 40%, and enhancing data accuracy through comprehensive business analysis and cross-functional collaboration.

publications.title: Business Analyst
publications.description:
5M+ Members Analyzed$1.2M Annual Savings15+ Tableau Dashboards18% Claims Reduction

Key Achievements:
• Extracted claims data for over 5 million members using SQL to identify anomalies in billing codes, reducing incorrect claims resubmissions by 18% and saving approximately $1.2M annually
• Built 15+ Tableau dashboards for executive and operations teams to monitor performance metrics for Medicare Advantage programs, decreasing reporting preparation time by 40% and improving data accuracy across departments
• Worked with care coordination and IT teams to gather and document 30+ detailed business and functional requirements for a care plan digitization project, which increased staff compliance with workflow standards
• Investigated prior authorization delays by reviewing workflows and stakeholder interviews; proposed improvements reduced average processing time from 5.2 days to 2.4 days, improving patient satisfaction scores
• Conducted weekly root cause analyses on service request failures, identifying common breakdown points and contributing to procedural changes that lowered escalations by 26% over a 6-month period
• Led UAT coordination for 3 SAP ERP–EHR integration updates, validating 50+ defects, tracking resolution in JIRA, and ensuring no critical issues during production deployment across Humana's primary care ecosystem
• Analyzed member engagement data using SQL and Excel to identify trends in wellness program participation, informing a targeted outreach campaign that increased preventive screening enrollment by 12.7% quarter-over-quarter

publications.title: Business Analyst
publications.description:
4 Client Platforms100+ User Stories35% Manual Reduction20+ Global Stakeholders

Key Achievements:
• Facilitated requirements gathering for 4 client software platforms in retail and logistics sectors, documenting 100+ user stories, functional specs, and workflows that ensured consistent delivery across Agile development cycles
• Conducted stakeholder interviews with more than 20 client representatives across global time zones to identify business needs, capturing accurate acceptance criteria and reducing requirement changes during development
• Created over 25 detailed process flowcharts using Visio and Lucidchart to map current and proposed workflows, enabling development teams to reduce turnaround times on feature delivery
• Reviewed 200,000+ data records during legacy system migrations, using SQL and Excel validations to flag inconsistencies and support data cleansing processes that improved import accuracy
• Coordinated UAT and QA cycles for 5 major feature rollouts, preparing 200+ test cases, validating system behavior, and tracking over 60 defects across multiple sprints in JIRA
• Produced weekly executive-level reports summarizing risks, open issues, timelines, and resource utilization for all active projects, supporting on-time delivery across 100% of client implementations during tenure
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to redesign client inventory workflows, leading to a revised module that cut manual reconciliation efforts by 35%, validated through post-deployment metrics over a 3-month window

projects.title: Airline Delay Mitigation System
projects.shortDescription: Python-based analytics system analyzing 500K+ flight records with 89% delay prediction accuracy and real-time monitoring capabilities.
projects.detailedDescription:
500K+ Flight Records89% Prediction AccuracyReal-time MonitoringPower BI Dashboards

Comprehensive analytics project analyzing airline operational data to predict and mitigate flight delays using advanced data processing techniques. Processed over 500,000 flight records, implementing sophisticated data cleaning and feature engineering pipelines. Developed predictive models achieving 89% accuracy in delay forecasting, enabling proactive decision-making for airline operations. Created interactive Power BI dashboards for real-time monitoring and incident response, facilitating quicker operational decisions and improved customer experience through data-driven insights.

projects.title: Financial Performance Forecasting Platform
projects.shortDescription: Advanced forecasting platform using ARIMA and regression analysis for enhanced financial prediction accuracy and automated anomaly detection.
projects.detailedDescription:
ARIMA ModelingRegression AnalysisAnomaly DetectionFinancial Forecasting

Comprehensive financial analytics platform implementing advanced time series forecasting techniques to enhance financial performance prediction. Developed sophisticated ARIMA models and regression analysis frameworks for accurate financial forecasting, enabling strategic business planning and risk assessment. Implemented automated anomaly detection algorithms for financial discrepancies, ensuring data integrity and providing timely alerts for exceptional financial events. The platform provides stakeholders with reliable forecasting capabilities and real-time monitoring of financial performance indicators.

projects.title: Auto Retail Inventory Optimization System
projects.shortDescription: Inventory management system using EOQ and safety stock analysis achieving 20% stockout reduction and optimized supply chain efficiency.
projects.detailedDescription:
20% Stockout ReductionEOQ AnalysisSafety Stock OptimizationSupply Chain Dashboard

Comprehensive inventory optimization project implementing Economic Order Quantity (EOQ) and safety stock analysis to minimize inventory costs while maintaining service levels. Developed sophisticated algorithms to reduce stockouts by 20% and optimize inventory carrying costs across automotive retail operations. Created a centralized dashboard system to monitor stock levels, reorder points, and supplier lead times, enabling proactive inventory management and supply chain optimization. The system provides real-time visibility into inventory performance and automated recommendations for inventory replenishment strategies.

projects.title: US Healthcare Analysis Dashboard
projects.shortDescription: Comprehensive Power BI dashboard analyzing U.S. healthcare industry dynamics from 2019-2020 with patient outcomes and provider insights.
projects.detailedDescription:
Healthcare Industry AnalysisPower BI DashboardPatient OutcomesProvider Insights

Key Achievements:
• Comprehensive healthcare industry analysis covering 2019-2020 data to reveal strategic insights for healthcare stakeholders
• Built interactive Power BI dashboard with DAX calculations for advanced analytics and dynamic filtering capabilities
• Analyzed patient demographics and treatment efficacy to identify trends in healthcare delivery and patient outcomes
• Created Entity Relationship (ER) diagrams illustrating complex data architecture and multidimensional analysis approach
• Tracked monthly expense trends and operational metrics to support resource optimization and strategic planning for healthcare administrators
• Developed hospital performance evaluation framework enabling data-driven decision-making and improved healthcare service delivery
• Generated actionable intelligence through comprehensive visualization supporting informed healthcare policy and operational decisions

projects.title: Time Series Analysis & Forecasting Platform
projects.shortDescription: Advanced Python-based forecasting platform implementing multiple ML algorithms including ARIMA, LSTM, CNNs, and Facebook Prophet for strategic decision-making.
projects.detailedDescription:
Multiple ML AlgorithmsARIMA & SARIMALSTM & CNNsFacebook Prophet

Key Achievements:
• Implemented comprehensive forecasting methodology using traditional statistical methods (ARIMA, SARIMA, Holt-Winters) and advanced machine learning approaches
• Developed neural network forecasting models including Multi-Layer Perceptrons (MLPs), Long Short-Term Memory (LSTMs), and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs)
• Integrated Facebook Prophet and FLAML AutoML for automated forecasting optimization and enhanced prediction accuracy
• Built end-to-end forecasting pipeline with exploratory data analysis, stationarity testing, and time series decomposition techniques
• Created modular Jupyter Notebook implementation demonstrating progression from basic to advanced forecasting paradigms
• Established comprehensive time series visualization framework for strategic decision-making and operational excellence
• Developed educational resource covering multiple forecasting techniques for industry professionals and researchers

Python & SQL IntegrationCustomer SegmentationSales Pattern AnalysisETL Workflows

• Implemented Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) workflows with automated data cleaning and preprocessing capabilities
• Conducted advanced customer segmentation analysis to identify top-selling products and purchasing behavior patterns
• Built comprehensive sales period optimization framework determining peak sales periods and revenue contribution analysis
• Created targeted marketing strategy recommendations based on customer behavior insights and product performance metrics
• Established data quality validation processes using SQL and Excel validations for data consistency and accuracy
• Demonstrated technical proficiency in data analytics lifecycle from raw data acquisition to actionable business insights and strategic recommendations
